data.oai_dc:dc: Table S6. Estimated percent use of foreign crops in current national food supplies and agricultural production systems. Data includes the raw mean minimum and maximum use values across years 2009-2011 per country, and the mean value between minimum and maximum per country across these years, as well as modeled mean values and variation metrics as estimated in a Bayesian framework using an interval-censored response variable bounded between minimum and maximum use estimates.
